amar2005-mapping.retrieve-value: given a set of specific cases, find attributes of those cases
amar2005-mapping.filter: given some concrete conditions on attribute values, find data cases satisfying those conditions
amar2005-mapping.compute-derived-value: given a set of data cases, compute an aggregate numeric representation of those data cases
amar2005-mapping.find-extremum: find data cases possessing an extreme value of an attribute over its range within the data set
amar2005-mapping.sort: given a set of data cases, rank them according to some ordinal metric
amar2005-mapping.determine-range: given a set of data cases and an attribute of interest, find the span of values within the set
amar2005-mapping.characterize-distribution: given a set of data cases and a quantitative attribute of interest, characterize the distribution of that attribute’s values over the set
amar2005-mapping.find-anomalies: identify any anomalies within a given set of data cases with respect to a given relationship or expectation, e.g. statistical outliers
amar2005-mapping.cluster: given a set of data cases, find clusters of similar attribute values
amar2005-mapping.correlate: given a set of data cases and two attributes, determine useful relationships between the values of those attributes

tabdoc:legend-group-or-ungroup.description: select on legend to group or ungroup data elements

tabdoc:level-drill-up-down.description: drilling in and out of data

tabdoc:table-calc-set-ordering-type.description: set order of the data as ascending or descending for example

tabdoc:undo.description: undo to the previous state of the exploration

tabdoc:add-to-sheet.description: add visualization or table to sheet

tabdoc:zoom-level.description: zoom in or out of the data

tabdoc:redo.description: redo to the next state of the exploration

tabdoc:remove-fields.description: remove fields from attributes or dimensions

tabdoc:keep-only-or-exclude-selection.description: keep or exclude a data point through or in selection

tabdoc:show-header.description: show the header of the visualization

tabdoc:on-toggle-axis-ranges.description: change ranges of axes on click

tabdoc:synchronize-axis.description: edit the view of the axes in combined visualizations

tabdoc:set-sheet-formatting.description: set the formatting of the sheet

tabdoc:change-label-align.description: change the alignment of the label

tabdoc:add-or-replace-trend-lines.description: add or replace the trend lines

tabdoc:resize-axis.description: edit the size of the axis

tabdoc:swap-rows-and-columns.description: change the view of the visualization

tabdoc:resize-cell.description: change the size of the cell in the table

tabdoc:show-me.description: explore the recommendations of other visualizations

tabdoc:legend-keep-or-exclude.description: keep or not keep the legend

tabdoc:change-size.description: change the size of the visualization

tabdoc:dual-axis.description: combine visualizations or change the look of visualizations

tabdoc:update-mark-labels-settings.description: update settings of the marks on the visualization

tabui:create-calculation-ui.description: create a visualization or table calculation

tabui:delete-fields-ui.description: delete fields from attributes or dimensions

tabui:switch-to-document.description: switch to programmatically making changes in XML

tabui:table-calc-ui.description: add table calculations like sum, percentage, etc. on table data

tabui:add-to-sheet-ui.description: add some visualization to the sheet

tabui:edit-group-value-label.description: rename a group of dimensions or attributes into one category

tabui:quick-table-calc-ui.description: perform quick calculations on the table

tabui:change-aggregation-ui.description: change the aggregation on the visualization or table

tabui:edit-title.description: edit the title of the visualization or table

tabui:change-field-type-ui.description: change the data type of the field

tabui:edit-trend-lines-ui.description: edit the kind of trend lines

tabui:edit-schema-calculation-ui.description: change the calculation on the table

tabui:size-legend-edit-ui.description: edit the size of the legend

tabui:color-legend-edit-ui.description: edit the colors of the legend

tabui:commit-pill-edit-ui.description: hard set the attributes and dimension pills

tabui:edit-member-alias-label.description: change the alias names of the label

range select.description: click and drag over multiple bins in one or more dimensions

zoom.description: navigate to higher or lower levels of data resolution

pan.description: navigate to areas of a visualization outside the current viewport

repaintFg.description: repaints the visualization blue in histograms

repaintBg.description: repaints the highlighted part of the visualization orange due to brushing

brush.description: mouse over a single bin in a one-dimensional plot

clear.description: reset all the brushing and linking

up.description: navigate to the area on top of the current viewport

down.description: navigate to the area at the bottom of the current viewport

move.description: navigate to the area on top of the current viewport

add_to_list_via_scatterplot_click.description: add politician to committee through selection of data point on scatterplot

remove_from_list_via_card_click.description: remove politican from committee through selection of data point on scatterplot

remove_from_list_via_list_item_click.description: remove politician from committee through selection on committee list

mouseover_from_list.description: explore politicians via the committee list

mouseout_from_list.description: explore politicans via the committee list

axes_attribute_changed.description: change dimensions or attributes of the axes

change_attribute_distribution.description: theres multiple distributions seen in the top left corner that show the distribution of data based on the attribute selections. This interaction is used to play around with the change in distribution of data that is the attributes in general

change_attribute_distribution_results.description: the same as change_attribute_distribution but changes the scatterplot based on changed attributes to a new view

brehmermunzner2013-mapping.filter: adjust the exclusion and inclusion criteria for elements in data/visualization
brehmermunzner2013-mapping.aggregate: change the granularity of data/visualization elements
brehmermunzner2013-mapping.annotate: addition of graphical or textual annotations associated with one or more visualization elements
brehmermunzner2013-mapping.import: addition of new elements to the visualization, including new data elements
brehmermunzner2013-mapping.derive: compute new data elements given existing data elements
brehmermunzner2013-mapping.record: save or capture visualization elements as persistent artefacts

gotzzhou2009-mapping.filter: reduce the data set being visualized
gotzzhou2009-mapping.query: bring additional data into a visualization or get additonal data
gotzzhou2009-mapping.brush: highlight a subset of visual objects
gotzzhou2009-mapping.change-range: scroll a visualization to a new location along an ordinal dimension
gotzzhou2009-mapping.merge: combine the data represented by two or more visual objects into a single visual group
gotzzhou2009-mapping.sort: re-arrange the visual presentation along particular dimension
gotzzhou2009-mapping.split: break apart the data represented by a set of visual objects into several new visual objects based upon some criteria, such as keywords or attribute values
gotzzhou2009-mapping.annotate: tag meta-information to the data represented by one or more visual objects
gotzzhou2009-mapping.bookmark: save the current visualization for future review
gotzzhou2009-mapping.create: creation of a new entry of data/visualization
gotzzhou2009-mapping.delete: similar to undo, remove an action from the middle of a user’s sequence of historically performed actions
gotzzhou2009-mapping.edit: modify the parameters of an action in a user’s action history
gotzzhou2009-mapping.redo: inverse of undo, a request to re-perform an undone action
gotzzhou2009-mapping.revisit: return to an earlier stage of analysis
gotzzhou2009-mapping.undo: removes the most recently performed action from a user’s sequence of historically performed actions
